main event: A UFO sighting was reported in the area between Corpus Christi and Robstown, Texas on March 4, 1968.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing two lights that appeared to be landing lights and were observed to be very low, the object made a circular motion and passed within 10 feet of TV towers, the observation lasted about 5 to 10 minutes, negative results were obtained from a Polaroid camera used to capture the sighting, there were reports of similar sightings on October 16 and 18, 1967 by the same observer.
sighted object: two lights inside a square structure
